OpenBabel
---------

Description: 
   The Open Source Chemistry Toolbox. OpenBabel is used as an external command to convert input formats. 

Website: 
   `http://openbabel.org/ <http://openbabel.org/>`__ 

License: 
   GNU General Public License GPL2.
   :download:`Click here <download/GNU_license_1991.txt>` to read the COPYING file as included with OpenBabel (the GPL2 license).
